variants.Description in input context: A missense mutation in the SNCA gene (p.G37E) associated with Parkinson's disease.

Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using SH-SY5Y cells expressing the SNCA p.G37E variant.

Readout description.Result Description: Increased α-synuclein aggregation observed in cells with the p.G37E variant compared to wild-type controls.

Biological replicates.Description: Three independent biological replicates were performed.

Technical replicates.Description: Each biological replicate was analyzed in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type SNCA-expressing cells were used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector-transfected cells were used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Two-tailed Student's t-test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: α-synuclein aggregation levels below 20% of wild-type controls.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: α-synuclein aggregation levels ≥ 50% of wild-type controls.
